about.summary: A base class for wrapping text-processing tools

name: toolwrapper
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "toolwrapper" %}
{% set version = "0.3.0" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 706f1f960e2b44de25a859417ac287e62de5db00e15ba5b60ef07d5bceacdc80

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.5
  run:
    - python >=3.5

test:
  imports:
    - toolwrapper

about:
  home: https://bitbucket.org/luismsgomes/toolwrapper
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: ./LICENSE
  summary: A base class for wrapping text-processing tools
  doc_url: https://bitbucket.org/luismsgomes/toolwrapper/src/default/README.rst

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - monaldoj
